Two Thoughts on How the Brain Works

July 8, 2019

Author: Bianca Yang
Email: ipacifics@gmail.com

Why do we “lose” memories? I have two theories:

  1. The brain has limited capacity.
  2. The brain has poor search functionality.

I have a sense that #2 is the more correct answer, but I don’t have concrete evidence backing up that hunch yet.
